item.title: Alchemist's Acid
item.fluff: When shattered, this glass vial releases a spray of acid

headline.name: Ammunition
headline.text: If you know this formula, you can also create acid ammunition.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Attack: Ranged 5/10 (one creature); Item's level + 4 vs Reflex
Hit: 2d6 acid damage.
Level 6: 2d6 acid damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).
Level 11: 3d6 acid damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).
Level 16: 3d6 acid damage, and ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends).
Level 21: 5d6 acid damage, and ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends).
Level 26: 5d6 acid damage, and ongoing 15 acid damage (save ends).
Miss: Half damage.

item.title: Alchemist's Fire
item.fluff: When shattered, this flask fills an area with alchemical flame

headline.name: Ammunition
headline.text: If you know this formula, you can also create fire ammunition.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Attack: Area burst 1 within 10 squares (each creature in the burst); Item's level + 4 vs Reflex
Hit: 1d6 fire damage.
Level 6: 2d6 fire damage.
Level 11: 4d6 fire damage.
Level 16: 5d6 fire damage.
Level 21: 6d6 fire damage.
Level 26: 7d6 fire damage.
Miss: Half damage.

item.title: Alchemist's Frost
item.fluff: This ceramic flask explodes in an icy haze when it hits, crippling its target with numbing cold

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Attack: Ranged 5/10 (one creature); Item's level + 4 vs Reflex
Hit: 1d6 cold damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.
Level 6: 2d6 cold damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.
Level 11: 2d6 cold damage, and the target is slowed and cannot make opportunity attacks until the end of its next turn.
Level 16: 3d6 cold damage, and the target is slowed and cannot make opportunity attacks until the end of its next turn.
Level 21: 4d6 cold damage, and the target is slowed, cannot make opportunity attacks, and grants combat advantage until the end of its next turn.
Level 26: 4d6 cold damage, and the target is slowed, cannot make opportunity attacks, and grants combat advantage until the end of its next turn.
Miss: Half damage.

item.title: Alchemist's Spark
item.fluff: The shattered flask releases two clouds that quickly coalesce and release a dazzling blast of energy

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Attack: Area burst 1 within 10 squares (each creature in the burst); Item's level +4 vs. Reflex
Hit: 1d6 lightning damage.
Level 6: 2d6 lightning damage.
Level 11: 4d6 lightning damage.
Level 16: 5d6 lightning damage.
Level 21: 6d6 lightning damage.
Level 26: 7d6 lightning damage.
Effect: The target takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the end of its next turn.
Level 18, 23, or 28: -2 penalty to all attack rolls (save ends).

item.title: Antivenom
item.fluff: This thick tonic can help counter the effects of most poisons

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against poisons from a source of 10th level or lower. This effect lasts for 5 minutes.
Level 11: 20th level or lower, and you gain resist 5 poison.
Level 21: 30th level or lower, and you gain resist 10 poison.

item.title: Augmenting Whetstone
item.fluff: This rough sharpening stone temporarily grants your weapon a magical enhancement

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Melee 1 (one melee or ranged weapon you hold); The weapon gains a +2 enhancement bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the encounter.
Level 11: +3 enhancement bonus.
Level 16: +4 enhancement bonus.
Level 21: +5 enhancement bonus.
Level 26: +6 enhancement bonus.
If the weapon has properties, such as critical damage, that depend on its enhancement bonus, it still uses its normal bonus to determine those properties.

item.title: Blinding Bomb
item.fluff: When thrown, this fist-sized ceramic sphere explodes in a blinding flash

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Attack: Area burst 1 within 10 squares (each creature in the burst); Item's level +4 vs. Fortitude
Hit: The target is flashbanged (save ends).
Crit: The target is blinded until the end of its next turn.
Aftereffect: The target is flashbanged (save ends).

While flashbanged, the target treats all nonadjacent creatures as having concealment and creatures more than 4 squares away as having total concealment. Creatures that do not rely on sight to detect other creatures are immune to this effect.
Miss: The target is flashbanged until the end of its next turn.

item.title: Clearsense Powder
item.fluff: This fine, silvery powder can restore lost senses

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Melee 1 (you or one ally); The target makes a saving throw against an effect that blinds or deafens it, even it that effect does not normally end on a save. The source of the effect must be 5th level or lower.
Level 6: 10th level or lower.
Level 11: 15th level or lower.
Level 16: 20th level or lower.
Level 21: 25th level or lower.
Level 26: 30th level or lower.

item.title: Clearwater Solution
item.fluff: This small glob of white jelly purifies even the most toxic liquids, from poisons to dwarven spirits

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Limitation: A clearwater solution can be applied to a volume of liquid filling a 5-foot cube (approximately 935 gallons). If it is applied to a volume of liquid larger than this, the solution has no effect but is still consumed.
Level 11: 10-foot cube (approximately 7,480 gallons).
Level 21: 15-foot cube (approximately 25,250 gallons).

Effect: Melee 1 (a volume of liquid); After 1 minute, the solution removes any poison or disease present in the liquid. It cannot remove poison or disease from water already in a creature's systen, and has no adverse effects on a creature with the Aquatic or Water keywords.

item.title: Foaming Plaster
item.fluff: When you combine these two reagents, one chalky and one viscous, a billow of expanding foam quickly forms in the area and then soon afterward hardens

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You mix the plaster.
Once before the end of the encounter, you can use a minor action to create an impression in the wet plaster of a footprint, a key, or a similar small object.
Giving the hardened plaster to someone else allows that person to identify the footprint, duplicate the key, and so on as if he or she had the original item.
If the plaster is not used by the end of the encounter, it hardens into a lump.

item.title: Holy Water
item.fluff: Undead and demons react poorly to the touch of this liquid

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Attack: Ranged 5/10 (one undead or demon) or Close blast 2 (all undead and demons in the blast); Item's level + 4 vs Reflex
Hit: 1d10 radiant damage.
Level 6: 2d10 radiant damage.
Level 11: 3d10 radiant damage.
Level 16: 4d10 radiant damage.
Level 21: 4d10 radiant damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Level 26: 5d10 radiant damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Miss: Half damage.

item.title: Oil of Lasting Flame
item.fluff: A vial of this oil provides head and flame for a long time

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You use this oil to start a fire or light a torch.
The fire burns for 8 hours using its existing fuel. It can be put out by normal means.
Level 12: The fire burns until it is put out.

item.title: Panther Tears
item.fluff: For a moment your vision is blurry, but when you blink away the excess liquid, you can see clearly through the gloom

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You gain low-light vision until the end of your next turn.
Level 7: For 5 minutes.
Level 12: For 1 hour.

item.title: Phantom Paint
item.fluff: The dark fluid within this small ceramic bottle glows dimly in torchlight

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You apply the paint to an area no larger than 5 square feet on a solid object.
The area emits dim light that is visible only in lamplight, torchlight, or some other light shed by an open flame, and lasts for 24 hours.
Level 7: Lasts for a week.

item.title: Primal Element
item.fluff: Creatures not of this world suffer the sting of this primal essence

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Attack: Ranged 4/8 (one aberrant, elemental, fey, immortal, or undead creature); Item's level +4 vs. Fortitude
Hit: 1d8 damage, and the target does not benefit from resistances until the end of your next turn.
Level 7: 2d8 damage.
Level 12: 4d8 damage.
Level 17: 5d8 damage.
Level 22: 6d8 damage.
Level 27: 7d8 damage.
Miss: Half damage.

item.title: Tanglefoot Bag
item.fluff: This small leather bag or satchel contains a sticky gel that can immobilize foes

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Attack: Ranged 5/10 (one creature); item's level +4 vs. Reflex
Hit: The target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Aftereffect: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Violet Phosphor
item.fluff: Vigorously agitating this small, transparent vial causes the liquid inside to emit a soft purple glow

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You shake the container, and it sheds bright light in a 5-square radius and dim light for 5 squares beyond that. The light lasts up to 4 hours.

item.title: Sweet Water
item.fluff: This small glob of white jelly purifies even the most toxic food and drink, from poisons to dwarven spirits

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You apply the sweet water to a portion of food equivalent to a light meal for one person, or to a single serving of a beverage.
The sweet water removes any poison or disease present in the food or beverage after 1 minute.
It cannot remove poison or disease from food or drink that is already in a creature's system.
